name: Abhishek Patil
introduction: Abhishek Patil Founder of NextDev Labs, driving innovation and excellence in technology. With 10+ years of experience, including a successful tenure at Cognizant, he brings deep technical expertise and a strategic vision for digital transformation. Passionate about building cutting-edge solutions, Abhishek leads with a forward-thinking approach, empowering businesses to scale and succeed in the digital era

name: Aman Panchal
introduction: Aman, Sr. Software Engineer at Next Dev, brings a strong technical background and a passion for innovation. His expertise in software development, system architecture, and strategic planning plays a pivotal role in driving the company’s growth. With a vision for cutting-edge solutions, Aman is committed to building scalable and impactful digital products.
